operator: Representaciones de Cristaleria y Peltre de Zamor
circumstances: While in cruising altitude on a flight from Saltillo to Monterrey, both engines failed simultaneously. The pilot was able to reduce his altitude and attempted an emergency landing in an open field located near Pesqueria. Both occupants escaped uninjured while the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause: Double engine failure in flight caused by a fuel exhaustion.
